title: Nesting Dragons
body:
Hello all!

We are currently looking for active members for our team, Nesting Dragons...

Looking for substitutes for all roles.

We play friday and saturday nights.

Must have good knowledge of at least 10 champions in preffered position.

Must have Skype.

Leave me a message here on the forum and I will get back to you!

Summoner Name:
Highest Rank Achieved:
Current SoloQ Rank:
Semi-Serious/Serious/Casual?:
What do you expect to get out of a team:
Any other Information:

Taking all applications.

replies.body: NightShadowb, current rank: silver 4. Highest rank: Silver 3 promos :(. i am semi-serious, i am expecting to have fun and at maybe get a ward skin. you think i play udyr too much if i have 175k points on him?
Hey I dont see a problem if you have that much mastery on him aha, I'd like to know if you would put that kind of effort into other champions however?
Eww only 175k points on Udyr, i got 592k points, get on my level Bruh
Pleb pls, i have 733k points on udyr. get out of here

HA U NOOB, UDYR IS A DEAD CHAMP, YOU SHOULD PLAY OTHER CHAMPS LIKE I HAVE THAN JUST UDYR.
900k points btw
This team is still active?
No i didn't even get accepted ;(. I was a silver 4 scrub back then

Summoner Name: on3kn1ghtstand (heh punny)
Highest Rank Achieved: Was on North american server, Silver 1
Current SoloQ Rank: Silver 3 In north america (that was with 250 ping... In Oce i get 20 ping)
Semi-Serious/Serious/Casual?: I play seriously  however I am a very laid back person, dont really like fights within the games but prefer to get criticism afterwards on what i can improve. (if i get it during game i tilt a bit occasionally)
What do you expect to get out of a team: A positive group revolved around competitive play learning the works of what it takes to really make a team, trying out different things and hopefully gaining a bit of a friendship with a adc, as i am a support main.
Any other Information: I have experience in 2 ranked teams, one was a platinum 4 team back in season 3, i was really bad and have to say i got carried by them but i learnt alot and then in season 5 in NA i had joined a team in winter frost which was my true bringing into competitiveness,  we had a heavy schedule of practice every day besides days that had tournaments, and i have had experience there that was unlike any experience, also analyzed a few games for the team to gain general knowledge, but to also fill in for the analyst that wasnt present.

I main support and am very confident in my abilities, with my move back to oceania i plan to improve myself as much as possible and get as high up as possible,  ill rank my champions in 3 catergories : excellent+ | average | bad-

Excellent {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} 

Average{{champion:16}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:99}} 

Bad-{{champion:44}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:54}} 

I may have missed a few, but thats the main idea of my champions, I hope i am considered, and good luck ;) If you would like to know anything inparticular, or a certain champion, or anything about me, message me. Also, my current OCE is sort of a smurf, kind of. i plan to make it my main, eventually (the account i used on this)
Hey buddy, I really like your application :) At this stage we have a main support for the team, are you comfortable being a substitute? and/or can you play any other roles? mid for instance?

Yeah, I pretty much assumed id be taking a substitute role, and was going to ask if thats what i can take, atleast for now. (current OCE account is level 21) as for other lanes, i do play a bit of everything, besides marksman, but i am only happy with how i play in support and jungle. Those are what i consider to what i should be playing, in jungle my list is from best to worse (not as much junglers) {{champion:35}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:9}} thats about all i can play in jungle. but note, my current OCE account is focused around support champions, so i dont really have any junglers, atleast at the moment so it would be some time before my account is jungle ready.
How soon would you be able to get to lvl 30
it all depends on how much i play, at the moment i dont play as much as i would like to, our of sheer boredom of playing by myself.
fair enough

Summoner Name: Chimmander

Highest Rank Achieved: Gold 3

Current SoloQ Rank: Gold 5 (stopped aiming for higher due as solo queue becoming pretty boring lately)

Semi-Serious/Serious/Casual?: Semi - Serious ( but can be casual and serious depending on needs)

What do you expect to get out of a team: Just to enjoy the game with people that also enjoy the game. I would love of course to get high ranks and maybe get because a better team, but as with all games, it all just depends on what the team as a group decide on.

Any other Information: Nothing too amazing, just another gamer who would love to play in a ranked team i guess. Im friendly, fun to talk to, a great guy, and would love to join a team!

My main roles are mid, jg and supp.
My champs include:
Top - Lulu +, Diana, Shen, Malphite+
Mid - Ahri +, Anivia +, Veigar +
Junglers - Diana, Sejuani, Noctourne +, Amumu
Adc (my worst role) - Tristana +, Draven, Vayne, Varus +
Supp - Taric, Shen +, Thresh +, Morg, Blitz

(+) Means My best/Prefered champs
out of your main roles, what position would you prefer to play the most?
I probably prefer jg the most but mid is close behind. So my prefered positions are jg>mid>supp>top>adc
What is your availability like?

Well i'm available most weeknights at around 8:30 onwards (sydney time) the only exception is friday where i don't get home till about 11. On Saturday and Sunday I'm normally available in the afternoons and nights. Hope this answers your question
Our team games revolve around playing friday nights 5:30pm onwards adelaide time

Summoner Name: Esgaroth
Highest Rank Achieved: Bronze 1
Current SoloQ Rank: Bronze 5
Semi-Serious/Serious/Casual?: semi -serious ( always wanting a fun game overall)
What do you expect to get out of a team:  enjoying the game while ranking up working on completely mastering a champ as well as lanes.  but overall to have a good time in the game.
Any other Information: well i have decent understanding of all roles but i prefer Jg, Support and mid but i have my favourites champs when it can to lanes 

Top- Darius,Singed & sion
Jg- Nunu, mord, elise( i do end up playing Darius and sion jg at times)
adc - Cait, Mf and corki 
Mid-  Lb, ahri, zed & Mord
Support- Janna, Taric , Thresh and blitz ( currently my blitz get 20+ assist per rank game)

hopefully i have answer all of the requirement any question feel free to ask away

Summoner Name: ToxicRaichu 
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=ToxicRaichu
Highest Rank Achieved: Gold 4
Current SoloQ Rank: Silver 1 promos
Semi-Serious/Serious/Casual?: Semi-Serious, but am available to become serious 
What do you expect to get out of a team: Looking to better myself, as well as my communication and game knowledge.
Any other Information: I'm the opposite of toxic :P I main adc but can fill as needed as i'm decent in all areas. Jungle being my weakest.
ADC being your main role, what is the role that you think you are second best at?
MId/sup
What confuses me is the fact we need to state our summoner names when they're the same as our board name, I'm pretty sure.
Because some people have tried playing on their smurfs so they dont actually apply with their smurf summoners they use their main name on the boards.

Summoner Name: Moses Il

Highest Rank Achieved: Gold 1 (plat placements went 2/3)

Current SoloQ Rank: Gold 5 (dropped to play with friends)

Semi-Serious/Serious/Casual?: Usually casual, but can play at a serious level and shot call if need be

What do you expect to get out of a team: Experience and the chance to play with the top players in oce

Any other Information: I can play any role but am specifically good at the mid lane. In the mid lane usually play control mages (azir and ori being my best) but can also play assassins like zed to a high proficiency. On several occasions with my higher ranked friends i have beaten diamonds in lane and won games while beating people with much higher ranks than me. I'm willing to do try outs and all that and have skype and always keep a  good sense of humor. I also have a fairly good ability to shot call and play from deficits.
What is your availability like?
I'm pretty sure you need to get to silver in ranked solo to get the border
Yeah mate, if you just want the silver border has to be solo queue
You're going to need to give me more details than that haha, we may be looking for semi-serious people doesn't mean we want people that just do what they feel like.

ZOMGitsLogan
Highest rank in season 4: Platinum 1
Current rank: Platinum 3
Have skype and Teamspeak
Can play any Role, but prefer jungle.
Serious. I want to be a contender for the OPL. But I am willing to play just for experience with a ranked team.

ps. I play a mean Diana jungle
Do you mind playing with team mates that are bronze-gold in solo queue?
Yeah I'm not too fussed, i just want some experience playing with ranked teams really.
Yea OPL is pretty sh*t compared to the rest of the world so we need better players :/
So you dont want to play with lower solo queue rankers?

Beetletank
Plat 5
Plat 5
Semi-serious
Good teamwork, good coordination, reliable, knowing how to make good quick decision in a least amount of time. No flame or toxicity. 
In team people who can play as a team not how they normally play soloq.

highest rank in season 4: silver 3 

role: top or jg can play a few champs mid and sup cant play adc at all

have skype: mic probs not the best 

amount played most days cant play during the hours of 2:30 pm to 10:00 pm as I have kids that use the wifi that 1k ping 

currents solo q rank: bronze something I have not played in ranked much sins season 4 but would like to start again 

what I expects to get out of a team: good knowledge of dbl jg, no flame or toxicity to me other team members or the enemy team, and must look at the map as I like to use smart pings but I suppose skype would stop that 

Any other Information: must get me a penta every game xD
Would you be available on friday evenings start 5:30-6:00pm onwards Adelaide time?
I should be
I sent you a request in game to give you a shot buddy
kk il be on tomorrow worlds on atm

PROJECT Ahri
Highest/current rank: Silver 1
Serious player, and can play almost anytime
I main mid and support.
Would love a team that plays seriously and for fun. 

Other; Prefer using Curse Voice. Skype makes me lag :(

Mains
Mid; {{champion:103}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:161}} 
Support; {{champion:1}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}}

Hashshashin 
Gold 4 i believe
Gold 5
Semi-Serious to casual 
Fun, Seeing how high we can reach together, improve on team oriented play style
What role do you play buddy?
